title: Your next office could be inside a VR headset
description:
Work from home typically means Zoom calls and Slack, but Mark Zuckerberg is envisioning a new way to work remotely: virtual reality. Last week, he unveiled Workrooms: Facebook’s latest effort to enter the “metaverse.” Recode’s Shirin Ghaffary (@shiringhaffary) explains. 

References:
Watch Mark Zuckerberg’s full interview with CBS unveiling Horizon Workrooms here.
